title: Tuzla-15
description: An archaeological site in the western Taman peninsula containing the remains of several structures associated with the Maikop-Novosvobodnaya culture and dated to the late fourth-early third millennia BCE.

properties.description: Point representing the location of the Tuzla-15 site, derived from an OpenStreetMap Node after Korenevskiy 2020.
properties.title: OSM location of Tuzla-15
